attributes.action: Televise Football Games on Saturdays between 2 and 5. 3pm kick off Games.
attributes.additional_details: ALL Premier League games at anytime as well as the 3pm kick offs can be watched in America and in all of Europe but not in the UK.
attributes.background: I believe this should be considered because in other countries these games are televised but the country the games are actually played in they're not (United Kingdom) leaving us to either not watch the game or but anot actual ticket which not everyone can afford tickets.
